t: Ord. No. 98-06. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING A NEW SECTION 2.03.040 TO AUTHORIZE THE VICE MAYOR OR MAYOR PRO TEMPORE TO PERFORM THE OFFICIAL DUTIES AND FUNCTIONS OF THE MAYOR IN THE EVENT OF HIS/HER ABSENCE OR INABILITY TO ACT.
